answers.answer: Hi there. You seem to be suffering from an autonomic neuropathy as is seen in chronic metabolic and endocrine disorders like diabetes, hypothyroidism, uremia, vitamin deficiencies like B12 and folate, compression neuropathy like carpal tunnel syndrome, cervical disc prolapsed or degeneration. Consult a neurologist for evaluation of these symptoms, certain blood tests and MRI spine. Treatment would be according to the cause determined. take care.

question: I'm a 32 years old guy, I have the feeling of pin and needles (and skin burning) in my hands, feet and also in my upper legs. I also feel huge amount of tiredness and stiffness in my upper legs, specially at night and during sleep, recently I am facing erectile dysfunction and problems with maintaining a long period hard on (I lose it immediately)! Any body with an idea??? Please help...
title: Pin & Needles, numbness, ED. PLease Help!
